name: RabiesTestsForRabiesVirusAntigenByImmunofluorescence
title: Rabies (Tests for rabies virus Antigen by Immunofluorescence)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Rabies virus antigen using Immunofluorescence),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Rabies virus Antigen;  

LOINC search:  'rabies Ag-isolate'),(Exclusion Criteria: non-Immunofluorescence methods)
